<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Convert a currency"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/settings/currency/convert"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a result of converting one currency into another.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"amount":{"description":"Amount to convert","type":"number"},"fromcurrency":{"description":"Currency to convert","type":"string"},"tocurrency":{"description":"Currency into which the original currency will be converted","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Decimal result of converting","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"number","format":"double"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
